General.Name: Getabec Public Company Limited
General.Description: Getabec Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes steam and hot water boilers in Thailand and internationally. The company offers thermal oil heaters, fire tube and hot water boilers, quick steam generators, water tube boilers, mobile and biomass boilers, heat recovery steam generators, burner and spare parts, and electric boilers, as well as plant balancing; and Smart Boilers 4.0, a boiler monitoring system. It also provides boiler plants, engineering, installation, erection, commissioning, maintenance, and repair services. The company was formerly known as German-Thai Boiler Engineering Cooperation Company Limited and changed its name to Getabec Public Company Limited in September 2015. Getabec Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
